Personality Trait.1: I cheat at games of chance.
Personality Trait.2: I shave coins or forge documents.
Personality Trait.3: I insinuate myself into people's lives to prey on their weakness and secure their fortunes.
Personality Trait.4: I put on new identities like clothes.
Personality Trait.5: I run sleight-of-hand cons on street corners.
Personality Trait.6: I convince people that worthless junk is worth their hard-earned money.

Ideal.1: Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Ideal.2: Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)
Ideal.3: Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)
Ideal.4: Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)
Ideal.5: People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)
Ideal.6: Redemption. There's a spark of good in everyone. (Good)

Bond.1: I'm trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
Bond.2: My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Bond.3: Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
Bond.4: I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
Bond.5: I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Bond.6: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.

Flaw.1: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
Flaw.2: When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
Flaw.3: If there's a plan, I'll forget it. If I don't forget it, I'll ignore it.
Flaw.4: I have a 'tell' that reveals when I'm lying.
Flaw.5: I turn tail and run when things look bad.
Flaw.6: An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I'm okay with that.
